page.title: 01Norwell & Cromwell _ General
page.content: This is mainly an{agricultural}area with 2 small villages,{Norwell}and {Cromwell.}However, employment in agriculture is now lower than at any time since the original Domesday Survey, the growth of{mechanisation being a major reason. Fields have been made larger in recent years.{Cereal crops}predominate with oil seed rape as a break crop. The area is mainly flat with just one significant rise at{Bathley Hill. As{Norwell}is now a conservation village the development of new housing is limited. Few if any of the families have lived in the village for more than 3 generations and it has become very much a commuter village. {Cromwell}is a village of contrasts; old housing, post war council houses & new bungalows. The busy A1 Trunk Road now bypasses Cromwell village.
